        Keep in mind this is optional. If you do not want to have a customized

              -------------------------------------------------

     All that is needed is to place your prompt(s) under this text block.

    
                        Please view the following examples:

               1) [
                        "OpportunityType.FULL_TIME": """
                          Our club comprises a dedicated group 
                          of cybersecurity students, all of whom 
                          are actively seeking entry-level 
                          job opportunities.
                        """,
                        "OpportunityType.INTERNSHIP": """
                          Our club comprises a dedicated group 
                          of cybersecurity students, all of whom 
                          are actively seeking entry-level 
                          internship opportunities.
                        """,
                  ]

                2) [
                        "OpportunityType.FULL_TIME": """
                          Our distinguished group comprises a 
                          dynamic assembly of ambitious business 
                          entrepreneurs, all united by their 
                          unwavering quest for career advancement 
                          and skill enhancement. Our business
                          entrepreneurs are seeking highly advance
                          job opportunities.
                        """,
                        "OpportunityType.INTERNSHIP": """
                          Our distinguished group comprises a 
                          dynamic assembly of ambitious business 
                          entrepreneurs, all united by their 
                          unwavering quest for career advancement 
                          and skill enhancement. Our business
                          entrepreneurs are seeking highly advance
                          internship opportunities.
                        """,
                   ]
